body:
Per http://golang.org/ref/spec#Notation, in EBNF the "or" operator "|" binds less strong than its Alternatives. So:

MethodSpec = MethodName Signature | InterfaceTypeName .

is the same as:

MethodSpec = (MethodName Signature) | InterfaceTypeName .

Or in other words, parentheses are not needed in this case.
